role: Head of Documentary and Magazine Programming
name: Florence Duhayot
background: Florence Duhayot serves as Head of Documentary and Magazine Programming at M6. Focus areas: Documentaries, factual series. They are looking for: Series with strong personalities and clear formats; access-led docs with commercial appeal. Overall network strategy: M6 seeks commercially appealing factual content with strong format potential, focusing on engaging personalities, relatable subjects, and entertaining approaches that connect with their younger-skewing mainstream audience.
thematic_priorities: Documentary series with strong personalities and clear formats
Current affairs with relatable impact on everyday life
Crime documentaries with emotional impact and mystery elements
History documentaries with strong narrative storytelling and mystery elements
format_specifications: Scheduling: Primetime/flagship slots where applicable; platform premieres for streamers
Typical Episode Counts: 3–10 for series, depending on strand
budget_parameters: Documentary: €100K–€250K per hour; Specialist Factual: €120K–€200K per hour
technical_requirements: Broadcast/streaming standards; details provided upon commissioning
Accessibility: Subtitles/captions; audio description per broadcaster requirements
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined; commissioner-specific interests included.
submission_process: One-page outline with headline, premise and format
additional_info: Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach
